name: Gem
headline: Talent engagement platform
description:
Gem’s talent engagement platform helps recruiting teams use data and automation to improve hiring speed, quality, and diversity.

Gem unifies data and context from the tools recruiters use every day, including email, applicant tracking systems, LinkedIn, and other social networks, to create a source of truth for all talent relationships. Armed with insights about the entire recruiting process, automation to reach out to talent at scale, and true cross-functional collaboration tools, TA teams can proactively and strategically plan for what’s ahead.

Gem's customers are savvy recruiting teams from industry-leading companies — like Wayfair, Dropbox, Nasdaq, Cisco, and Doordash — who understand that hiring the best talent in the market is key to maintaining their competitive advantage.

founders.name: Steven Bartel, Founder/CEO
founders.description: Co-founder & CEO @ Gem. Prior to founding Gem, Steve was an engineering leader at Dropbox where his experience working closely with the recruiting process allowed him to see the lack of technology in the space. This inspired him to co-found Gem, which allows recruiting teams of all sizes to source talent, engage with talent, and use data to improve recruiting processes.

## Hear what our wonderful customers say.
Over 1,200 companies, from startups to large enterprises, trust Gem to fuel their growth.
Hear from our customers
[![One Medical Customer Story image](https://www.gem.com/)![One Medical | Story Card Quote](https://www.gem.com/)3+Tools consolidated$15,000saved in annual spend"Without Gem, I had to go look in four different places to piece together a story. With Gem, you have a track record of success and excellence. This is a tool that is not just solving for one of your recruiting needs, Gem wants to solve for all of them."![Sammy Reardon | One Medical](https://www.gem.com/)Sammy ReardonSenior Director of Recruiting at Amazon One MedicalLearn more](https://www.gem.com/</case-study/onemedical>)
[![Celestica Customer Story Image](https://www.gem.com/)![Celestica | Customer Logo](https://www.gem.com/)700+Hires in 90 days“Within the first 30 days of using Gem, we were filling positions that had been open for over a year”![Jaime Schmitt | Celestica](https://www.gem.com/)Jaime SchmittTalent Attraction Manager for North America at CelesticaLearn more](https://www.gem.com/</case-study/celestica>)
[![Unity Customer Story Image](https://www.gem.com/)![Unity | Customer Logo](https://www.gem.com/)10 dayReduction in time-to-fill+20%Above industry average offer accept rate“ Recruiters are meeting their SLAs because they have access to precisely the data that helps them do so.” ![Emily Russell | Unity](https://www.gem.com/)Emily RusselSenior Global Data Analyst for Recruiting at UnityLearn more](https://www.gem.com/</case-study/unity>)
[![Robinhood Customer Story Image](https://www.gem.com/)![Robinhood - reverse | Logo](https://www.gem.com/)8-10 hours Saved per week, per recruiter“[Gem] was easily one of the better products I’d seen in terms of streamlining manual work: searching for phone numbers, emails, social media sites.”![Joe Gillespie | Robinhood](https://www.gem.com/)Joe GillespieHead of Tech Recruiting at RobinhoodLearn more](https://www.gem.com/</case-study/robinhood>)
[![Prestige Care Customer Story Image](https://www.gem.com/)![Prestige Care | Customer Logo](https://www.gem.com/)9x ROIachieved with Gem$125,000saved on agency fees“Gem has been a remarkable partner for us at a financially approachable cost that’s positively impacting our residents’ lives through high-quality health care providers to serve them. And we wouldn’t be having the success we’re having if it weren’t for this partnership.”![Blake Theiss | Avatar Image](https://www.gem.com/)Blake ThiessDirector of Talent Acquisition at Prestiage Care, Inc.Learn more](https://www.gem.com/</case-study/prestige-care>)
[![Yext Customer Story Page](https://www.gem.com/)![YEXT | Customer Logo](https://www.gem.com/)1+ weekfaster time to hire than the industry average"Believe it or not, we’ve never needed SLAs. No other company I’ve worked at has organically moved through the process as quickly as Yext. Most recruiters we hire into the org have a high sense of urgency."![Joe Pecci | Yext](https://www.gem.com/)Joe PecciSenior Manager of Engineering RecruitingLearn more](https://www.gem.com/</blog/yext-average-time-to-hire>)
[![Chili Piper Customer Story Image](https://www.gem.com/)![Chili Piper | Customer Logo](https://www.gem.com/)54%Increase in URG candidates“We’ve seen a 54% increase in URG candidates and a 31% increase in female-identified candidates making it to the first-round interview. Offers extended to, and offers accepted by, URGs have increased. That’s been phenomenal to see.”![En-Szu Hu-Van Wright | Chili Piper](https://www.gem.com/)En-Szu Hu-Van WrightTalent Ops Manager at Chili PiperLearn more](https://www.gem.com/</case-study/chili-piper>)
[![Procore Story card image](https://www.gem.com/)![Procore | Customer Logo](https://www.gem.com/)200 hoursSaved per month"From the moment we introduced Gem's training in May, our team nearly doubled its usage of the tool in just a couple of months. This isn't just a measure of adoption; it highlights how the tool contributed to overall productivity. It shows how the team not only adopted it but implemented it effectively"![Nicole Carriere | Procore ](https://www.gem.com/)Nicole CarriereSenior Manager, Global Talent Sourcing & Executive Search at ProcoreLearn more](https://www.gem.com/</case-study/procore-technologies>)

![One Medical Customer Story image⟨2⟩![One Medical | Story Card Quote⟨2⟩]3+Tools consolidated$15,000saved in annual spend"Without Gem, I had to go look in four different places to piece together a story. With Gem, you have a track record of success and excellence. This is a tool that is not just solving for one of your recruiting needs, Gem wants to solve for all of them."![Sammy Reardon | One Medical⟨2⟩]Sammy ReardonSenior Director of Recruiting at Amazon One MedicalLearn more](https://www.gem.com/</case-study/onemedical>)
![Celestica Customer Story Image⟨2⟩![Celestica | Customer Logo⟨2⟩]700+Hires in 90 days“Within the first 30 days of using Gem, we were filling positions that had been open for over a year”![Jaime Schmitt | Celestica⟨2⟩]Jaime SchmittTalent Attraction Manager for North America at CelesticaLearn more](https://www.gem.com/</case-study/celestica>)
![Unity Customer Story Image⟨2⟩![Unity | Customer Logo⟨2⟩]10 dayReduction in time-to-fill+20%Above industry average offer accept rate“ Recruiters are meeting their SLAs because they have access to precisely the data that helps them do so.” ![Emily Russell | Unity⟨2⟩]Emily RusselSenior Global Data Analyst for Recruiting at UnityLearn more](https://www.gem.com/</case-study/unity>)
![Robinhood Customer Story Image⟨2⟩![Robinhood - reverse | Logo⟨2⟩]8-10 hours Saved per week, per recruiter“[Gem] was easily one of the better products I’d seen in terms of streamlining manual work: searching for phone numbers, emails, social media sites.”![Joe Gillespie | Robinhood⟨2⟩]Joe GillespieHead of Tech Recruiting at RobinhoodLearn more](https://www.gem.com/</case-study/robinhood>)
![Prestige Care Customer Story Image⟨2⟩![Prestige Care | Customer Logo⟨2⟩]9x ROIachieved with Gem$125,000saved on agency fees“Gem has been a remarkable partner for us at a financially approachable cost that’s positively impacting our residents’ lives through high-quality health care providers to serve them. And we wouldn’t be having the success we’re having if it weren’t for this partnership.”![Blake Theiss | Avatar Image⟨2⟩]Blake ThiessDirector of Talent Acquisition at Prestiage Care, Inc.Learn more](https://www.gem.com/</case-study/prestige-care>)
![Yext Customer Story Page⟨2⟩![YEXT | Customer Logo⟨2⟩]1+ weekfaster time to hire than the industry average"Believe it or not, we’ve never needed SLAs. No other company I’ve worked at has organically moved through the process as quickly as Yext. Most recruiters we hire into the org have a high sense of urgency."![Joe Pecci | Yext⟨2⟩]Joe PecciSenior Manager of Engineering RecruitingLearn more](https://www.gem.com/</blog/yext-average-time-to-hire>)
![Chili Piper Customer Story Image⟨2⟩![Chili Piper | Customer Logo⟨2⟩]54%Increase in URG candidates“We’ve seen a 54% increase in URG candidates and a 31% increase in female-identified candidates making it to the first-round interview. Offers extended to, and offers accepted by, URGs have increased. That’s been phenomenal to see.”![En-Szu Hu-Van Wright | Chili Piper⟨2⟩]En-Szu Hu-Van WrightTalent Ops Manager at Chili PiperLearn more](https://www.gem.com/</case-study/chili-piper>)
![Procore Story card image⟨2⟩![Procore | Customer Logo⟨2⟩]200 hoursSaved per month"From the moment we introduced Gem's training in May, our team nearly doubled its usage of the tool in just a couple of months. This isn't just a measure of adoption; it highlights how the tool contributed to overall productivity. It shows how the team not only adopted it but implemented it effectively"![Nicole Carriere | Procore ⟨2⟩]Nicole CarriereSenior Manager, Global Talent Sourcing & Executive Search at ProcoreLearn more](https://www.gem.com/</case-study/procore-technologies>)

generated_description:
**Company Overview: Gem**

- **Founded:** 2017
- **Location:** San Francisco, CA
- **Team Size:** Approximately 200 employees
- **Funding:** Part of Y Combinator Batch S17
- **Website:** [Gem](https://www.gem.com/)
- **Group Partner:** Nan

**Mission:**
Gem is a talent engagement platform designed to enhance recruiting efforts by leveraging data and automation. Its primary goal is to improve hiring speed, quality, and diversity within recruiting teams.

**What They Do:**
At the core of Gem’s offerings is a powerful platform that integrates data from various recruiting tools—think email, applicant tracking systems, LinkedIn, and numerous social networks. This unified data creates a "source of truth" for organizations, enabling talent acquisition (TA) teams to build stronger relationships with potential hires. Gem empowers recruiters to not only react but also plan strategically for the future, providing insights and automation to facilitate outreach to talent at scale.

**Customer Base:**
Gem's clientele includes high-profile companies like Wayfair, Dropbox, Nasdaq, Cisco, and DoorDash. These organizations recognize that attracting top talent is critical for maintaining their competitive edge in the market. More than 1,200 TA teams trust Gem to streamline their hiring processes.

**Key Features:**
1. **AI-First Recruiting Software:** Gem is marketed as an all-in-one recruitment platform that integrates applicant tracking systems (ATS), sourcing, CRM, scheduling, and analytics—all powered by AI.
  
2. **Workflow Automation:** Their platform offers automation for various functions such as sourcing and outreach, inbound application review, and interview scheduling.
  
3. **AI Enhancements:** With features like AI-powered outbound sourcing, application review, and talent rediscovery, Gem helps teams find and engage candidates more effectively.

4. **Diverse Solutions:** Gem caters to startups as well as Fortune 500 companies, allowing organizations to select and integrate only the tools they need.

5. **End-to-End Analytics:** This functionality helps teams visualize their recruiting efforts and performance, extracting actionable insights to continually refine their strategies.

**Results Driven:**
Companies utilizing Gem often report significant improvements in recruiting efficiency. For instance, many have experienced reductions in time-to-hire, increased productivity for recruiters, and substantial cost savings.

**Why Gem?**
Gem is designed for usability, minimizing the learning curve for recruiters. This means teams can focus more on making hires rather than getting bogged down in tech headaches.

In summary, Gem is reshaping the way companies approach talent acquisition with its AI-driven, unified platform that not only streamlines processes but enhances the quality and diversity of hires. For any recruitment team looking to regain a competitive edge in a challenging talent market, exploring Gem's capabilities might be a vital step.
